article_title: AMA, Doctor Allies Push CVS Rivals To End Tobacco Sales

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: The American Medical Association and allied physician groups this week are exacting added pressure on pharmacies and others that sell health products to join CVS’ move to cease peddling cigarettes and other tobacco products. Earlier this year, CVS grabbed international kudos that included acclaim from the White House for the giant [...]
